scenes.name: Define SAR and introduce the concept of Polarimetry (PolSAR) as an upgrade from monochrome to color.
Explain the physics of EM waves (H/V planes) and the Scattering Matrix.
Visualize the three main scattering mechanisms: Surface, Volume, and Double Bounce.
Explain Pauli Decomposition and color mapping.
Conclusion: Mention key missions and real-world value.
